title: Phalar Aluve
content: re Value: 250 gold Weight: 1.35 kg ID: 6d0d3206-50b5-48ed-af92-a146ed6b98f2 Singing Sword. Once per Short Rest, as an action, you can use either of the following powers: Sing: All allies within 6m gain +1d4 on Attack and Saving Throws (CHA, WIS, INT). Shriek: All enemies in 6m are -1d4 on Saves (as above) and take extra 1-4 Thunder damage when hit. Duration: 5 turns. Performance +1 One of the very few Finesse two-handers, making it capable of performing Sneak Attacks. The "Singing Sword: Shriek"
